name: .VFS0 File Extension
summary: Learn about .VFS0 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Game file used by Metro 2033 and Metro: Last Light, a post-apocalyptic video game that takes place in Moscow; contains .OGG sound files used by the game for music and sound effects.

content: NOTE: You need the Metro 2033 Mod Tools to assist you in extracting the OGG files from the VFS0 file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
